description: This file defines a React functional component 'LessonListItem' that displays a lesson with its title, description, completion status, and an 'Open' button. It imports React and a Badge component, and it is likely used within a list of lessons in an LMS or learning application.

methods.name: LessonListItem({ lesson, completed, onOpen, index })
